Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a mechcanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a mechcanical problem on the train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
